footer.text: At My CN, we are a premier logistics provider committed to delivering efficient and dependable shipping solutions tailored to our customers' needs. Leveraging cutting-edge technology and a customer-centric approach, we ensure seamless and timely delivery experiences across the globe.

profile.welcomeText: Welcome to MY CN - Your Gateway to Chinese Shopping

address.title: Your Dedicated MY CN China Shipping Hub
sections: Your exclusive MY CN China locker address is now ready for use! Shop effortlessly from any Chinese online store.
Simply enter your unique MY CN address during checkout to have purchases delivered directly to your secure personal locker.

benefits.heading: Key Benefits:
items: 45 days of COMPLIMENTARY storage with complete transparency
benefits.footer: Our smart solutions maximize your savings on global shipping costs.

profile.newPackagesSubtitle: Drag, drop, and dominate your deliveries. Organize up to 6 packages into one smart shipment to save time, space, and international shipping costs. Your package control center just got an upgrade.

common.termsDescription: Please read our terms and conditions carefully before using My CN services. By registering or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms regarding shipping, storage, payments, and more.
common.privacyDescription: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how My CN collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our services. By using our platform, you consent to our data practices as described.

address_modal.text: First and last name must match the government-issued ID of the person receiving the shipment.

orderModel.title: You're almost ready to ship!
orderModel.text: Simply select your desired destination, choose the shipment type that best suits your needs, and confirm your payment. Once completed, sit back and track your package as it makes its way to its destination.

about.visionText: We envision a seamless global marketplace where individuals and businesses can shop and ship across borders without barriers — anytime, anywhere.
about.missionText: Our mission is to simplify and empower global logistics by providing reliable, cost-effective, and user-friendly solutions tailored to the needs of every customer.
about.valuesText: We are driven by transparency, trust, and innovation. Our values reflect a strong commitment to customer satisfaction, operational excellence, and continuous improvement in everything we do.

shippingCalculator.title: Shipping Cost Calculator
shippingCalculator.subtitle: Quickly estimate your shipping fees based on destination, weight, and delivery preferences.
shippingCalculator.note: If you would like to ship a full container, please
instructions: Enter your package's weight and dimensions to get an estimated shipping cost and check carrier availability in your region.
Keep in mind that any changes to weight, size, declared value, or item classification may affect your final shipping quote.
Shipping costs may vary depending on the selected shipping method, destination country, and applicable customs or duties.
Make sure your package details are accurate to avoid delays or additional fees.
Estimated delivery times and shipping rates are provided by carriers and may be subject to change due to external factors.
For high-value or fragile items, consider adding insurance or opting for a premium shipping service.

transportationTitle: A variety of trusted transportation methods for every shipment
